name: Fallout

task.description:
Configuring the Hi-res patch.
 Make sure you enable it before clicking Done, if you have problems with mouse movements click Manual edit config and change ALT_MOUSE_INPUT to 1
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- fixt: https://github.com/Sduibek/fixtsrc/releases/download/0.81alpha/Fallout_Fixt_0.81alpha_FULL_CUSTOM.exe
game:
  appid: 38400
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    description: Installing the FIXT mod pack
    executable: fixt
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: "Configuring the Hi-res patch.\n Make sure you enable it before clicking\
      \ Done, if you have problems with mouse movements click Manual edit config and\
      \ change ALT_MOUSE_INPUT to 1"
    executable: f1_res_Config.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: sed -i 's/SingleCore=1/SingleCore=0/g' '$GAMEDIR/ddraw.ini'
    file: /usr/bin/env
winesteam:
  overrides:
    ddraw.dll: native
